suggestions.prompt: Create a secure login page using React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Supabase Auth. Use shadcn/ui components for the form. Validate email/password, handle loading/error states, and add JSDoc comments.
Write unit tests for a Supabase API service using Vitest. Mock Supabase client, check all expected inputs/outputs, and use MSW for integration.
Build a reusable Button component using shadcn/ui and Tailwind. Support variants (primary, secondary), sizes, and accessibility roles. Add storybook stories and test interactions.
Set up route-based code-splitting using React Router v6. Use React.lazy and Suspense to lazy load pages in pages/ directory.
